name: HotDogFight
description:
Hot. Dog.

Once upon a time I worked at Der Weinerschnitzel. You think you could get the stink of CornDog grease off of you 20 years later, but you would be wrong.

Enjoy this tiny bit of catharsis and catsup... Ketchup with me on this hot dog arena game.

Features 2 levels, randomly chosen at start.

Send  $1 dollar my way and I will go out and post a picture of me eating a chilidog in the comments. NO joke. Make me fat on chilidogs. I DARE you. 

My very first personal game, reskinned with some delishious little hot dogs.

I love you weinerdudes. I relish our friendship*

Play in browser or download the zips, built in PixelEdit and Construct 2.
